body_html: It depends on the body of your while loop. Sometimes there are independent calculations that can be run in parallel (e.g. if you have many different loop variables and they don't all depend on each other). Also, I suspect you're seeing the manual calculation run faster than the while loop because the body computation is small compared to the overhead of running the while loop. A more complicated or expensive body would probably see less of a difference.
